title: Apply Rules
description: Look up and apply rules to the query

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

enabled.title: Enable Async Execution
enabled.description: Run the expensive data loading or processing part of this stage in a separate thread allowing the pipeline to continue executing. The results of this asynchronous execution can be merged into the pipeline request using a downstream "Merge Async Results" stage.

asyncId.title: Async ID
asyncId.description: A unique value to use as reference in downstream "Merge Async Results" stages.

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: The collection to read rules from. Leave blank to use the default rules collection for the current application.

params.title: Query Parameters
params.description: Additional query parameters to use when querying the rules collection

useOriginalQueryIfNoRulesMatch.title: Use Original Query If No Rules Match
useOriginalQueryIfNoRulesMatch.description: If checked, then this stage will try to match rules using the original query (un-tagged) sent into the tagger stage if available.

matchPartialFilterQueries.title: Partially Matched Filter Queries Will Trigger the Rule
matchPartialFilterQueries.description: If checked, then this stage will trigger filter rules as long as there is one filter query in the query parameter that matches the filter specified in the rule.
